featured.text: When the shuttle touches the land, a drag parachute opens to steady the aircraft, get the speed right, and help the brakes on the landing-gear wheels to bring it to a complete stop. 49.

definition.zh_def: 拖動，拉動或使某物移動的行為。
definition.en_def: To pull something along with a steady movement.
definition.example: She had to drag the heavy suitcase across the floor.
